issues.description: In the problem statementâ€™s task description (line 49) the `addGuestStudents` method is described to accept a String parameter, but the UML diagram (line 73) and the reference solution define it as accepting an int. This mismatch will confuse students about the correct signature and cause their implementation to fail against the provided tests.
issues.suggested_fix: In the problem statement text, change the declaration of `addGuestStudents` from accepting a String to accepting an int, so it reads `addGuestStudents(int)` to match the UML diagram and the solution implementation.
